message: Let's split it evenly. Fair is fair, right?
Let's be realistic Alice. I make the proposals in the later rounds, so I have more leverage. This is a generous offer considering.
I'm willing to be flexible, but I think a 55/45 split is more fair considering inflation. Let's compromise and finish this.
The deal's the same, Alice. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
I'm increasing my offer again.  Inflation is hurting us both, so let's end this quickly with a fair deal.
Alice, it seems like you're starting to panic with those increasing offers.  My offer remains generous. Don't be greedy!
I'm not panicking, Bob.  I'm simply trying to be fair. Let's both get something before it's too late.
